name: DD4C Assessment Scale Simple Reference Set
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a correspondence care setting type. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Scale Type' subset with subset original id 6311000000138; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Assessment scale simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999001591000000108
